Summary: Jan-Claudiu Crisan is a mid-level Java backend developer with five years of experience in building and maintaining software solutions, particularly REST APIs using Java, Spring, and related technologies. He has collaborated in agile team settings, developed point-of-sale and enterprise solutions, and demonstrates strong technical and communication skills. He is proficient in English and Romanian, with advanced digital skills in software engineering and Microsoft Office.

CleanedResumeText:
Jan-Claudiu Crisan
Arad, Romania | crisan.janclaudiu@yahoo.com | 

WORK EXPERIENCE
Java Developer – Nagarro (May 2022 – June 2023, Arad, Romania)
• Developed and maintained Java backend applications using Spring MVC, Spring Boot, Spring Data, Spring Security, Maven, Docker, and Bitbucket.
• Collaborated with a team to design, build, and maintain efficient REST APIs.
• Implemented security solutions, conducted code reviews, and ensured software reliability.
• Technologies: Java 8, Spring, Liquibase, Maven, Docker, Bitbucket, GIT, Mockito.

Cash Register Sales and Developer – DEM SERVICE (Mar 2019 – Oct 2021, Arad, Romania)
• Contributed to full-cycle development of point-of-sale systems and cash register programming.
• Developed CRUD features and communication protocols between cash registers and web interfaces.
• Participated in bug fixing, continuous improvement, sales, and customer relations.
• Technologies: Java 8, Kotlin, Spring Boot, MySQL, Hibernate, GIT.

EDUCATION
Bachelor's Degree in Software Engineering (EQF Level 7)
Universitea "Aurel Vlaicu" Arad, Romania (2018 – 2022)

CERTIFICATIONS
ECDL (European Computer Driving Licence), Excel, Word, PowerPoint (2015)

LANGUAGES
Romanian (Native), English (C1 Advanced)

DIGITAL SKILLS
Java, Spring MVC/Boot/Data/Security, REST APIs, Maven, Docker, Bitbucket, GIT, MySQL, Hibernate, Kotlin, Mockito, Microsoft Office Suite, Data Structures and Algorithms
